title: Manage Equipment Calibration Schedule
description: A metrology engineer needs to manage the annual calibration schedule for all critical equipment in a manufacturing facility.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all equipment due for calibration in the next 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 25 pieces of equipment.

tasks.description: Coordinate with production planners to schedule downtime for each piece of equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the calibration activities with minimal disruption to production.

tasks.description: Create work orders for the calibration technicians.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates work orders in the maintenance system for each scheduled calibration.
